------------------------
Purpose of SampleCommonLoader
------------------------
The project demonstrates how to use these Enclave Common Loader Layer APIs: 
- enclave_create
- enclave_load_data
- enclave_initialize
- enclave_delete

------------------------------------
How to Build/Execute the Sample Code
------------------------------------
1. Install Intel(R) Software Guard Extensions (Intel(R) SGX) PSW and Intel(R) SGX SDK.
2. Open the solution "sample.sln" with Microsoft Visual Studio.
3. Build and execute it directly.
